name: crafty-shield
effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
short_effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
